data.title: Great Cocktails, Made with Passion
data.text:
My wife and I stopped in on Halloween night for a quick drink and to get out of the hubbub for a few minutes. I have to say that this is exactly the type of place I love finding in every city I visit. The cocktails were made with care and passion and were delicious. 
I must give a shout out to our bartender that night, Landon -- great cocktails and conversation! 
I would have stayed longer but we had to go out in search of some food as the evening was "catching up" with us a bit. I wish I had found this place first. 
Put this place on your list of places to go the next time you're on Fremont Street!

data.title: Special place !
data.text: Had a groupon for this little gem and ended up staying for several more cocktails! By far the best bartender we have ever met ! Have a Copperfield. He will create an amazing cocktail for you ! Great prices ! Thanks Landon and folks from Ohio for a fun time !

data.title: Good cocktails
data.text: I had a Groupon for this place and when my boyfriend and I were in Las Vegas we stopped by to have drinks.  They had good craft cocktails with fresh ingredients.  The bartender was friendly and we liked sitting outside and relaxing.

data.title: Good Drinks
data.text: We enjoyed the place enough to stop by twice in the same night. There was a pleasant vibe, great drink specials and the bartender was very knowledgeable.

data.title: Thoughtful interesting beverage options.
data.text: Small but very thoughtful menu. Bartender was very knowledgeable about variety of spirits they offer. Fun to watch him craft cocktails. Neat atmosphere.

data.title: Cool atmosphere
data.text:
Found this cool little spot while waiting for dinner on Freemont street. 
Huge selection of American craft beers, and happy hour from 4pm-8pm Monday to Friday. 
If you're thirsty, stop by and enjoy the funky decor, and chill out to some cool tunes.

data.title: Great bartender
data.text: Stopped in for a drink while visiting Fremont. This place is located just outside of the experience. Not a far walk by any means. So please, go! We stopped in rather early in the afternoon so it wasn't busy. The bartender knows what he is doing. I believe his name was Landon. Nice small bar with a great bartender and fantastic drinks. what more could you want?! Check it out if you can.

data.title: Best cocktail I ever had!
data.text: Stopped here on the walk back from the container park.  The drinks were amazing!  I ordered a Moscow Mule but the bartender (I mean mixologist because he was that good) suggested a Mexican Mule instead.  It was fantastic and the one quickly turned into three.  I will definitely be back next time I am in Vegas.

data.title: $3 beers during happy hour
data.text: a nice bar a little less noisy then other places around so you can sit and have a beer and a chat. $3 beers durring happy hour. Good service and will go again

data.title: Best and freshest cocktails!!
data.text: This lounge was the highlight of Freemont.  It's so easy to walk by because it's so small but don't walk by, go in!!  The cocktails are amazing and Landon, the bartender, is not only friendly but a cocktail artist.  We bought a Groupon before we went otherwise we might never have this gem.

data.title: Hip, classy
data.text: With the resurgence of the Freemont Street area,  I would have to credit Vanguard for some of this. A hip, retro style of bar where your mixologist will craft your drink based on your likes. Order a Copperfield and let them work their magic.  You will be impressed from the first sip to the last. Good vibes,  Das, open area out front that let's you people watch on Freemont Street should you choose.  Great place to hang with friends, family or go alone you will meet someone interesting,  maybe even Jack Sparrow.

data.title: Great Service!!
data.text: I bought a groupon for here while we were in Vegas.  We went before the big crowd came in. We sat out of the deck and was served many wonderful drinks for my birthday!

data.title: Great Bar Experience
data.text: Took advantage of a Groupon and visited the Vanguard Lounge in downtown Vegas. i must say we truly had a great time. Our bartender Landon was exceptional in his approach to his craft. He was engaging, while mixing up the best cocktails we have ever tasted. Although the ambiance changes later at night with a younger crowd, it was a pleasure just to sit, drink and chat with Landon (good luck on your new venture btw).

data.title: Fantastic!
data.text: I wanted to go early in order to miss the crowds and am glad we did.  The bartender was extremely helpful while we tried to decide and very personable too.   I don't remember all the drinks we tried, but they were delicious.  I loved the tin cups one of the drinks were served in.  You could tell he took great care in each drink he created.  We loved it.

data.title: A unique experience
data.text: Vanguards is a small bar/club Downtown LasVegas. We arrived during happy hour when the prices are greatly reduced. The highlight here is a master bartender who will strive to make you a made to order cocktail that will be a unique experience. Our bartender was eager to help guide us toward finding the right options for each member of our party. Each drink was unique and over the top delicious. During the evenings when they are crowded this service is not an option. A nice option instead of the many slushy concoctions that line Fremont Street.

data.title: Great drinks, didn't have food
data.text: If we decide to have dinner downtown we always go a little early so that we can go to the Vanguard and have a cocktail.  Honestly I didn't even realize that they had food, but with the drinks that they serve, who cares?  The speciality cocktails all have fresh ingredients and the bartenders really know HOW to make and serve a drink.  These are cocktails they way they are supposed to be.

data.title: "relaxing!!"
data.text: visited Vegas earlier this month have been to Vegas many times and usually stay on Freemont street. Would have never stopped in this place but i purchased a groupon. What a great find!. Landon was our bartender and he made us some amazing cocktails! He was very knowledgable with good conversation. Was nice to take a break from the noisy casino's and have a nice quiet drink. We will visit again when in Vegas.

data.title: Lounge of the year!
data.text:
While on vacation in Vegas, we purchased a Groupon for the Vanguard Lounge... It was $10 for $20 worth of drinks... 

The Bartender greeted us immediately and was very friendly. He made our drinks using fresh ingredients and honestly, it was one of the best drinks my husband and I ever had. We proceeded to buy another round... :)

Not only was the bartender extremely knowledgeable about the different liquors and ingredients, he took the time to show us the difference between certain types of gins etc... It was a very nice experience... I wish we had more passionate bartenders out there... This man was not just a bartender but an artist, a mixologist... It was very refreshing to see. 

Would definitely come back...

data.title: not your typical bar
data.text: Used a groupon and got the best deal because we went during happy hour.  This a great little bar downtown and not very crowed.  The bartender used all fresh fruits to make our drinks.  Will definitely go back

data.title: Case of the Monday's
data.text: We visited Vanguard for a case of the Monday's. It happened to be a little slower than I thought, but we had great conversation with the Bartender, Jackie. She was very knowledgable about mixology and was making some ad hoc drinks for a few curious guests that were at the bar. They have a fab menu full of adventurous drinks and staff that is rather knowledgable. Thanks Jackie, see you soon!
